name: THUNDERBALL (itch)
description:
THUNDERBALL

THUNDERBALL is a physics based platforming game. Click, hold and drag to aim, then release to fling your electrical sphere in the air ! Power the different switches and pressure plates to change the layout of the world, and make your way through 11 different stages of increasing difficulty. Aim for the fastest time and the lowest amount of hits !

Controls :
  • Move : Left Mouse Button
  • Retry : R
  • Fullscreen : F
  • Show mouse pointer : Escape
  • Hide (capture) mouse pointer : C (Already hidden by default)
Credits :
  • Made by TaliOS using the Godot Engine
  • Uses some sounds of Kenney's Sci-Fi sound effects (https://www.kenney.nl/)
  • Every piece of music used is by Eric Matyas (soundimage.org)

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 73 with the theme "Power" and the limitation "Only 5 colors".

For reference, my fastest time during testing was about 03:42, for a total of 92 shots ! Let me know if you managed to beat this score !

Thank you for playing !
